PROMPTSETXUI.XUIEDITOR:
<dialog height="506" icon="PRPT" id="PRPTS" left="279" top="4" width="420"><readpanel fill="b" id="PRPTBOX" nl="1" scroll="v" text="Parameters"><properties><entry name="text">Parameters</entry><entry name="modifiable">0</entry></properties><text enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_FILESET_NAMEs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" nl="1" regex="" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Fileset name" tooltip="This is the name of the software product to be removed and can specify either an entire software product or any separately removable filesets within the software product." upper="0" required="0" alt="1" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_STRING</entry><entry name="text">Fileset name</entry><entry name="multiselect">0</entry><entry name="separator">;</entry><entry name="len"/><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_FILESET_NAMEs.00</entry><entry name="inputassistance">0</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="upper">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="showaspassword">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">This is the name of the software product to be removed and can specify either an entire software product or any separately removable filesets within the software product.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="regex"/><entry name="required">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="multiline">0</entry><entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry><entry name="onchangereset"/><entry name="resetable">1</entry></properties></text><text enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_FILESET_LEVELs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Fileset level" tooltip="This indicates the level of the software product is to be removed and is of the form vv.rr.mmmm.ffff. If a fileset has an additional fix ID (also know as ptf id), that ID must also be specified in the Level as in vv.rr.mmmm.ffff.ppppppp" upper="0" alt="1" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_STRING</entry><entry name="text">Fileset level</entry><entry name="multiselect">0</entry><entry name="separator">;</entry><entry name="len"/><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_FILESET_LEVELs.00</entry><entry name="inputassistance">0</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="upper">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="showaspassword">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">This indicates the level of the software product is to be removed and is of the form vv.rr.mmmm.ffff. If a fileset has an additional fix ID (also know as ptf id), that ID must also be specified in the Level as in vv.rr.mmmm.ffff.ppppppp</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="regex"/><entry name="required">0</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="multiline">0</entry><entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry><entry name="onchangereset"/><entry name="resetable">1</entry></properties></text><text enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_FILESET_LISTFILEs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Fileset list from file" tooltip="Reads the names of the software products from a list file defined in this parameter. Software fileset names, optionally followed by a level, should be one per line of text, and any text following the second set of white spaces or tabs on a line is ignored. Output from the installp -l command is suitable for input to this flag. Uses the option "-f" at command line, if parameter not empty." upper="0" alt="1" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_STRING</entry><entry name="text">Fileset list from file</entry><entry name="multiselect">0</entry><entry name="separator">;</entry><entry name="len"/><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_FILESET_LISTFILEs.00</entry><entry name="inputassistance">0</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="upper">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="showaspassword">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Reads the names of the software products
from a list file defined in this parameter. Software fileset names, optionally
followed by a level, should be one per line of
text, and any text following the second set of
white spaces or tabs on a line is ignored. Output
from the installp -l command is suitable for
input to this flag. Uses the option "-f" at command
line, if parameter not empty.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="regex"/><entry name="required">0</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="multiline">0</entry><entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry><entry name="onchangereset"/><entry name="resetable">1</entry></properties></text><dynradiogroup enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_SUPR_FILESET_WCARDs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Supress fileset wildcard" tooltip="Does not wildcard the fileset name defined in this parameter. Use this flag from smit so it only removes the fileset chosen and not the filesets that match. For example, if you choose foo.rte, foo.rte.bar is not automatically pulled in, as it would be by default, without setting this parameter to 'yes' Uses the option "-w" at command line if parameter set to 'yes'." alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry><entry name="text">Supress fileset wildcard</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_SUPR_FILESET_WCARDs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Does not wildcard the fileset name defined in this parameter. Use this flag
from smit so it only removes the fileset
chosen and not the filesets that match. For
example, if you choose foo.rte, foo.rte.bar is
not automatically pulled in, as it would be by
default, without setting this parameter to 'yes'
Uses the option "-w" at command line if parameter
set to 'yes'.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/></properties></dynradiogroup><dynradiogroup enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_FAIL_IF_NOT_INSTALLEDs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Fail if not installed" tooltip="If set to 'yes', the runbook function fails if the package is not installed but trying to remove." alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry><entry name="text">Fail if not installed</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_FAIL_IF_NOT_INSTALLEDs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">If set to 'yes', the runbook function fails if the package is not installed but trying to remove.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/></properties></dynradiogroup><text enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_LOG_FILEs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Log file" tooltip="Enables event logging. The parameter enables the user to append certain parts of the installp command output to the log file specified by this parameter. By default the output of the installp command goes to stdout and stderr, unless SMIT or VSM is used, in which case the output goes to the smit.log. The log file variable &UC4RB_LOG_ FILE# must specify an existing, writable file, and the file system in which the file resides must have enough space to store the log. The log file does not wrap. Uses the option "-e" at command line, if parameter not empty." upper="0" alt="1" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_STRING</entry><entry name="text">Log file</entry><entry name="multiselect">0</entry><entry name="separator">;</entry><entry name="len"/><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_LOG_FILEs.00</entry><entry name="inputassistance">0</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="upper">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="showaspassword">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Enables event logging. The parameter enables
the user to append certain parts of the installp
command output to the log file specified by this parameter. By default
the output of the installp command goes to
stdout and stderr, unless SMIT or VSM is
used, in which case the output goes to the
smit.log. The log file variable &UC4RB_LOG_
FILE# must specify an existing, writable file,
and the file system in which the file resides
must have enough space to store the log. The
log file does not wrap. Uses the option "-e" at command line, if
parameter not empty.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="regex"/><entry name="required">0</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="multiline">0</entry><entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry><entry name="onchangereset"/><entry name="resetable">1</entry></properties></text><integer enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_DEBUG_LEVELs.00" max="" min="" nl="1" text="Debug level" tooltip=" Specifies the verbose option that provides four levels of detail for preinstallation output. The valid values for the parameter are 2, 3, or 4. The default level of verbosity, without the use of the -V flag, prints an alphabetically ordered list of FAILURES, WARNINGS, and SUCCESSES from preinstallation processing. Requisite failures are reported with emphasis on the real cause of the failure. Extraneous requisites for failed filesets are not displayed. The preinstallation output is modified by levels 2 through 4 as described below: 2: Prints alphabetically ordered list of FAILURES and WARNINGS. Requisite failures are displayed with additional information describing requisite relationships between selected filesets and the requisites causing them to fail. Failing requisites suppressed under Level 1 are displayed. Preinstallation SUCCESSES are displayed in the order in which they are processed. 3: Level 3 is the same as Level 2, with the exception that additional requisite information is displayed for SUCCESSES. 4: Level 4 is the same as Level 3 for SUCCESSES and WARNINGS. Requisite failures are displayed in a format depicting detailed requisite relationships. Note: If verbosity level 2 or higher is used, the files that are restored on to the system is shown in the output. Because this will make installp's output much more verbose, make sure that your / (root) filesystem does not become full when the /smit.log becomes large (if using smit to run installp). Uses the option "-V" at command line, if not -1." alt="1"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_NUMERIC</entry><entry name="text">Debug level</entry><entry name="min"/><entry name="max"/><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_DEBUG_LEVELs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip"> Specifies the verbose option that provides four
levels of detail for preinstallation output. The
valid values for the parameter are 2, 3, or 4. The default
level of verbosity, without the use of the -V
flag, prints an alphabetically ordered list of
FAILURES, WARNINGS, and SUCCESSES
from preinstallation processing. Requisite failures
are reported with emphasis on the real
cause of the failure. Extraneous requisites for
failed filesets are not displayed. The preinstallation
output is modified by levels 2
through 4 as described below: 2: Prints alphabetically
ordered list of FAILURES and
WARNINGS. Requisite failures are displayed
with additional information describing requisite
relationships between selected filesets and
the requisites causing them to fail. Failing requisites
suppressed under Level 1 are displayed.
Preinstallation SUCCESSES are
displayed in the order in which they are processed.
3: Level 3 is the same as Level 2, with
the exception that additional requisite information
is displayed for SUCCESSES. 4:
Level 4 is the same as Level 3 for SUCCESSES
and WARNINGS. Requisite failures
are displayed in a format depicting detailed requisite
relationships. Note: If verbosity level 2
or higher is used, the files that are restored on
to the system is shown in the output. Because
this will make installp's output much more verbose,
make sure that your / (root) filesystem
does not become full when the /smit.log
becomes large (if using smit to run installp).
Uses the option "-V" at command line, if not -1.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue">0</entry></properties></integer><dynradiogroup enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_PREVENT_BOSBOOTs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Prevent performing bosboot" tooltip="Prevents the system from performing a bosboot in the event that one is needed. Uses the option "-b" at command line, if parameter set to 'yes'." alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry><entry name="text">Prevent performing bosboot</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_PREVENT_BOSBOOTs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Prevents the system from performing a bosboot in the event that one is needed.
Uses the option "-b" at command line, if parameter set to 'yes'.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/></properties></dynradiogroup><dynradiogroup enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_REMOVE_DEPSs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Remove dependencies" tooltip="Use to remove or reject software, this flag automatically removes or rejects dependents of the specified software. Uses the option "-g" at command line, if parameter set to 'yes'." alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry><entry name="text">Remove dependencies</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_REMOVE_DEPSs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Use to remove or reject software, this flag automatically removes or rejects dependents of the specified software.
Uses the option "-g" at command line, if parameter set to 'yes'.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/></properties></dynradiogroup><dyncheckgroup enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_REMOVE_ONLY_PARTSs.00" mode="list" nl="1" quotes="" required="0" separator=";" text="Remove only specified parts" tooltip="Remove the specified part of the software product. You can multi-select the following options: root: indicates the / (root) part is to be removed (at command line r is used together with the option -O) /usr/share: indicates the /usr/share part is to be removed (at command line s is used together with the option -O) /usr/: indicates the /usr part is to be removed (at command line u is used together with the option -O) implementation note: if all selected, nothing is generated at run time. If e.g. root and /usr/share is selected, the option "-Ors" is used at command line." alt="1"><properties><entry listparam="C,N" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.AUTOMIC_AIX.PRV.VARA.INSTALL_PARTS</entry><entry name="text">Remove only specified parts</entry><entry alias="multiselect" name="cgmultiselect">1</entry><entry alias="separator" name="cgseparator">;</entry><entry alias="haslist" name="cghaslist">0</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_REMOVE_ONLY_PARTSs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Remove the specified part of the software product. You can multi-select the following options:
root: indicates the / (root) part is to be removed (at command line r is used together with the option -O)
/usr/share: indicates the /usr/share part is to be removed (at command line s is used together with the option -O)
/usr/: indicates the /usr part is to be removed (at command line u is used together with the option -O)
implementation note: if all selected, nothing is generated at run time. If e.g. root and /usr/share is selected, the option "-Ors" is used at command line.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="required">0</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="onchangereset"/><entry name="resetable">1</entry></properties></dyncheckgroup><dynradiogroup enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_PREVIEW_ONLYs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Preview only" tooltip="Performs a preview of an action by running all checks for the specified action. Uses the option "-p" at command line, if parameter not empty." alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry><entry name="text">Preview only</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_PREVIEW_ONLYs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Performs a preview of an action by running all checks for the specified action.
Uses the option "-p" at command line, if parameter not empty.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/></properties></dynradiogroup><text enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_SUDO_PASSWORDs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="1" text="Sudo password" tooltip="Sudo password." upper="0" alt="1" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_STRING</entry><entry name="text">Sudo password</entry><entry name="multiselect">0</entry><entry name="separator">;</entry><entry name="len"/><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_SUDO_PASSWORDs.00</entry><entry name="inputassistance">0</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="upper">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="showaspassword">1</entry><entry name="tooltip">Sudo password.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="regex"/><entry name="required">0</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="multiline">0</entry><entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry><entry name="onchangereset"/><entry name="resetable">1</entry></properties></text></readpanel></dialog>

PROMPTSETDATA.DATAEDITOR: <PRPTS ontop="1"><PRPTBOX><UC4RB_FILESET_NAMEs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_FILESET_NAME#" ReadFromTable="OPSE"></UC4RB_FILESET_NAMEs.00><UC4RB_FILESET_LEVELs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_FILESET_LEVEL#" ReadFromTable="OPSE"></UC4RB_FILESET_LEVELs.00><UC4RB_FILESET_LISTFILEs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_FILESET_LISTFILE#" ReadFromTable="OPSE"></UC4RB_FILESET_LISTFILEs.00><UC4RB_SUPR_FILESET_WCARDs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SUPR_FILESET_WCARD#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">NO</UC4RB_SUPR_FILESET_WCARDs.00><UC4RB_FAIL_IF_NOT_INSTALLEDs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_FAIL_IF_NOT_INSTALLED#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">NO</UC4RB_FAIL_IF_NOT_INSTALLEDs.00><UC4RB_LOG_FILEs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_LOG_FILE#" ReadFromTable="OPSE"></UC4RB_LOG_FILEs.00><UC4RB_DEBUG_LEVELs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_DEBUG_LEVEL#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">0</UC4RB_DEBUG_LEVELs.00><UC4RB_PREVENT_BOSBOOTs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_PREVENT_BOSBOOT#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">NO</UC4RB_PREVENT_BOSBOOTs.00><UC4RB_REMOVE_DEPSs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_REMOVE_DEPS#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">NO</UC4RB_REMOVE_DEPSs.00><UC4RB_REMOVE_ONLY_PARTSs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_REMOVE_ONLY_PARTS#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">root;/usr/share;/usr</UC4RB_REMOVE_ONLY_PARTSs.00><UC4RB_PREVIEW_ONLYs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_PREVIEW_ONLY#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">NO</UC4RB_PREVIEW_ONLYs.00><UC4RB_SUDO_PASSWORDs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SUDO_PASSWORD#" ReadFromTable="OPSE"></UC4RB_SUDO_PASSWORDs.00></PRPTBOX></PRPTS>
